law.catch_line: Choses in action -- Petition for discovery -- Sale.
law.text: Where choses in action are brought into court by virtue of a petition for discovery of assets instituted against an insolvent debtor, the court may order their sale upon the same terms as are prescribed for the sale of other personal property. The court shall make all needful orders for the transfer of title to the purchaser.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2185.
